about_the_game:
EMBARK ON A MYTHIC SUDOKU ADVENTURE

Awaken on a strange island with a mysterious temple, ridden with memorials of Avatars from a forgotten era. Explore the island, overcome the temple trials, and unlock the secrets of the past as you search for a way home.

A WHOLE NEW WAY TO SUDOKU

It's more than just a grid: simultaneously solve multiple puzzles and uncover magical items that will help you along the way. Discover up to 9 themed sudoku variants, each with its own environment and a unique set of rules to match. With completely randomly generated puzzles, you'll get a new experience every time.

Plus, uncover even more modes as you complete trials and explore the island!
detailed_description:
EMBARK ON A MYTHIC SUDOKU ADVENTURE

Awaken on a strange island with a mysterious temple, ridden with memorials of Avatars from a forgotten era. Explore the island, overcome the temple trials, and unlock the secrets of the past as you search for a way home.

A WHOLE NEW WAY TO SUDOKU

It's more than just a grid: simultaneously solve multiple puzzles and uncover magical items that will help you along the way. Discover up to 9 themed sudoku variants, each with its own environment and a unique set of rules to match. With completely randomly generated puzzles, you'll get a new experience every time.

Plus, uncover even more modes as you complete trials and explore the island!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750 Ti
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Mythos: Sudoku Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Embark on a mythic adventure and experience sudoku in a whole new way, with new rules and magical items as you overcome trials and find your way home.
